title: Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light, Height Adjustable Indoor Gardening System, Hydroponic Growing System Built-in Timer Function
descriptions:
Grow fresh herbs, crisp lettuce, and vibrant flowers right on your countertop—no soil, no guesswork. This 12-pod Hydroponics Growing System pairs a powerful 25W full‑spectrum SMD LED with an Advanced Deep Flow water circulation system to deliver faster, healthier harvests all year round.

Why you’ll love it:
- 5x faster growth: The full-spectrum LED provides 30% more luminous flux than traditional lights, fueling robust growth from seed to harvest.
- Set-and-forget watering: The low‑noise pump circulates water every 30 minutes to keep nutrients fresh and oxygenated.
- Fewer refills: A roomy 4L tank supports up to 18 days of self-sufficient growth and features a clear water level gauge.
- Grows with your plants: An adjustable light post extends up to 17.78 inches to accommodate leafy greens, herbs, tomatoes, peppers, flowers, and more.
- Effortless control: Built-in timer automates light and circulation cycles so your garden thrives even when you’re busy.
- Ready out of the box: Includes 12 planting baskets and hats, 12 biochar sponges, plant food A & B, adapter, and a step-by-step manual.
- Peace of mind: Backed by a 360‑day warranty and responsive after‑sales support.

Create a thriving indoor garden in any season—clean, compact, and beautifully illuminated. From pesto-ready basil to salad bowls on demand, this hydroponic system makes fresh homegrown flavor easier than ever.
